data.sentence: The word أَمْ comes from the root ا م and is associated with the meanings:
The word نَحْنُ comes from the root ن ح ن and is associated with the meanings: We
The word ءَأَنْتُمْ comes from the root ا ن ت م and is associated with the meanings: you (plural)

data.meanings: To sow seed, cast seed, till the ground, cause [the plants, children] to grow, give increase to, he who sows, reaps, what is raised by means of sowing, seed-produce, what is sown. (Zay Ra Waw 'Ayn = offspring, children, a child)
data.sentence: The word تَزْرَعُونَهُ comes from the root ز ر ع and is associated with the meanings: To sow seed, cast seed, till the ground, cause [the plants, children] to grow, give increase to, he who sows, reaps, what is raised by means of sowing, seed-produce, what is sown. (Zay Ra Waw 'Ayn = offspring, children, a child)

data.sentence: The word الزَّارِعُونَ comes from the root ز ر ع and is associated with the meanings: To sow seed, cast seed, till the ground, cause [the plants, children] to grow, give increase to, he who sows, reaps, what is raised by means of sowing, seed-produce, what is sown.
